How do you beat the last
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battle Card Archive (Game Boy): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): How do you beat the last
By cariy tiger on Thursday, August 23, 2001 - 11:10 am:

By Eagle Fierce on Friday, August 24, 2001 - 03:31 am:

First, after completing the original ruins, you'll need to battle Holly in each of their locations. After beating her in all the areas, an earthquake will uncover a new ruin just south of the town. Get permission and descend as deep as you can. You'll come to what appears to be the main room, but there will be no disk or guardian in the chamber. Exit and go to the church (for lack of a better word). You'll get an urgent plea to return the sacred disk. You'll find the culprit in the sixth ruin. Find and defeat her for the Rock Dino card and a disk-like object. Return to the seventh ruin and place the disk in the slot in the final chamber to open a secret passage that will lead to the head of the last ruin. you'll most likely have to do this three or four times through to get all of the cards you need. Two times minimum(the game, not the ruin), so you can get the Hare Hound card.

Note: While it is not required that you search the seventh ruin before getting the disk mission, it was what I did, as well as what seems to be suggested by the direction of programming (else you wouldn't have your rival suggest training more when you go down without it), so I know it works.
